Package com.composum.pages.commons.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ComponentManager  
    ContentManager<ModelType extends ContentDriven>  
    EditService
    the service interface for Pages editing operations
    PageManager  
    PagesTenantSupport  
    ResourceManager  
    ResourceManager.Design
    a design rule for a content element determined from the template of the elements page
    ResourceManager.ReferenceList
    a list of references (simple transferable as a JSON array)
    ResourceManager.ResourceReference
    the reference to a potentially non existing (static included; can exist but mustn't) content resource this is a simple transferable (JSON) resource description without the overhead of a NonExistingResource and with access to the resources properties (if resource exists), the configuration and the resource type properties
    ResourceManager.Template
    a page template to create pages as copy of the template and to reference design rules embedded in the template
    ResourceManager.TemplateContext  
    SiteManager  
    Theme
    a Theme in the Pages context implements a strategy to modify the markup rendering and to customize the page clientlibs without content changes; such a theme supports the use of standard components with modified markup and a style suitable to this markup
    ThemeManager
    the central service to determine and manage the available Themes
    TrackingService
    a simple service interface to track page requests
    VersionFactory  
    VersionsService  
    VersionsService.ContentVersionFilter
    a filter interface for the version search operations
    WidgetManager  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ComponentManager.ComponentScope  
    PageManager.PageTemplateList
    A list of Pages with unique names to collect all templates available in the resolvers search paths.
    PagesComponentManager  
    PagesContentManager<ModelType extends ContentDriven>  
    PagesEditService  
    PagesPageManager  
    PagesReleaseManagerPlugin
    Fixes the Release Worktree for inconsistencies due to deactivated pages.
    PagesResourceManager
    the ResourceManager implementation of Pages handles templates and design rules of content resources and provides some resource management operations such as create from template, copy, move, ...
    PagesResourceManager.TemplateCopyFilter
    the node filter to prevent from copying template rules and meta data to content targets
    PagesSiteManager  
    PagesThemeManager  
    PagesVersionFactory  
    PagesVersionsService  
    PagesWidgetManager  
    ResourceManager.NopTemplateContext
    the 'transform nothing' context used in case of a copy operation
    SiteManager.UniqueSiteList
    A list of Sites with unique names to collect all templates available in the resolvers search paths.
    VersionsService.ActivationStateFilter
    a filter implementation using a set of activation state options
    VersionsService.ContentVersionByResourceFilter
    A VersionsService.ContentVersionFilter that filters for ContentVersion.getResource() matching a ResourceFilter.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    PagesResourceManager.Config
    the configuration for the template cache
